detectors.description: Lotto.cash(uint256,uint256) (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#89-113) ignores return value by winner.send(subpot) (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#109)
Lotto.fallback() (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#131-160) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#141)

Deprecated standard detected uint256(block.blockhash(blockIndex)) (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#116):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

detectors.description: Constant Lotto.blocksPerRound (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#12) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

	- rounds[roundIndex].isCashed[subpotIndex] = true (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#111)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#131-160):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#141)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#146)
	- buyersLength = rounds[roundIndex].buyers.length ++ (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#149)
	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#150)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#153)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#154)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (contractSource/SmartBug/etherpot_lotto.sol#157)
